origin.cursedorigins.minotaur.name: Minotaur
origin.cursedorigins.minotaur.descriptio: Forget ass eat grass! Originating from the Belgian Cow, you are a force to be reckoned within the lawn mowing industry.
origin.cursedorigins.literal_creeper.des: I'm a Creeper, Minecraft's grim reaper, Blowing up blocks like Al-Q-. You are so good at blowing up blocks that you spread your influence to other living organisms.
origin.cursedorigins.glass_golem_two.des: Constructed from the remains of the first iteration of the glass golem, this reincarnation of the golem packs a lot of power behind it's swings. However the framework of which it was based on remains broken.
power.cursedorigins.cant_sprint.name: Powerful Stride
power.cursedorigins.mow_hay.name: Mow Hay
power.cursedorigins.mow_hay.description: You are able to eat grass and variants of grass while not holding anything in your main hand.
power.cursedorigins.delicious_dairy.name: Delicious Dairy
power.cursedorigins.delicious_dairy.desc: You and other players can milk you with a bucket.
power.cursedorigins.axe_proficiency.name: Axe Proficiency
power.cursedorigins.axe_proficiency.desc: All axe attack damage is increased depending on the axe.
power.cursedorigins.status_immunity.name: Calcium
power.cursedorigins.status_immunity.desc: You are immune to all status effects.
power.cursedorigins.cake_is_a_lie.name: The Cake is a Lie
power.cursedorigins.cake_is_a_lie.descri: You can't digest normal sources of food.
power.cursedorigins.self_explode.name: Explosion.gif
power.cursedorigins.self_explode.descrip: You have the ability to explode, infecting any players caught in the explosion.
power.cursedorigins.ailurophobia.name: Ailurophobia
power.cursedorigins.ailurophobia.descrip: Being near cats or ocelots weakens and makes you faster.
chat.creeperalert: You were infected by a Creeper
power.cursedorigins.glass.name: Glass
power.cursedorigins.glass.description: Your transparent ass makes you die in one hit.
power.cursedorigins.cannon.name: Cannon
power.cursedorigins.cannon.description: Due to your massive amount of strength, all types of damage you deal will kill anything in one blow.
power.cursedorigins.comedy.name: Comedy
power.cursedorigins.comedy.description: You make a certified glass breaking noise when hurt.
death.attack.glassFall.player: I don't know how you managed to do this %1$s and %2$s
death.attack.cannonPlayer: %1$s was sent back to Lumbridge by %2$s
death.attack.cannonPlayer.item: %1$s was sent to Brazil by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.cannonFirework: %1$s didn't celebrate the New Year unlike %2$s
death.attack.cannonFirework.item: %1$s was turned into shrapnel by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.cannonEgg: %1$s got turned into an omelette by %2$s
death.attack.cannonEgg.item: %1$s got turned into scrambled eggs by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.cannonPearl: Was it worth ender pearling into %1$s %2$s?
death.attack.cannonPearl.item: Was it worth ender pearling into %1$s %2$s?
death.attack.cannonSnowball.item: %1$s is now shaking and crying because of %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.cannonFireball.item: [SERVER ANNOUNCEMENT] %1$s killed %2$s with the help of %3$s
